metadata.description: A flexible visual separator for content sections. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations, multiple line styles (solid, dashed, dotted), gradient effects, decorative text/icon in center, and invisible spacers. Essential for creating visual hierarchy and breaking up content in marketing pages.

accessibility.notes: Uses semantic <hr> element for simple dividers, <div role='separator'> for complex variants. Includes aria-orientation attribute. Respects high contrast mode with stronger borders.

responsive.notes: Section dividers increase spacing on larger screens. Vertical dividers adapt based on container height.

variant.description: Visual style variant. 'section' provides thick divider with large spacing, 'spacer' is invisible for layout, 'gradient' fades to transparent on edges
